title: Video Editor
job_overview:
We’re an e-commerce brand seeking a skilled and reliable video editor who specializes in direct response advertising. You will be working with raw user-generated content (UGC), testimonials, and product clips to create compelling, high-converting video ads for platforms like Pinterest, Google, and Meta.

This is a long-term collaboration for someone who values creative ownership, consistent work, and professional growth.

Key Responsibilities
Edit short-form direct response video ads (15–60 seconds)

Transform raw content into polished, conversion-focused creatives

Apply engaging text overlays, captions, transitions, and music

Structure videos for performance: strong opening, clear messaging, effective call to action

Deliver multiple versions for A/B testing (e.g. different hooks or formats)

Follow creative briefs precisely and meet deadlines consistently

Requirements
Demonstrable experience with UGC and direct response ad editing

Strong portfolio showcasing paid social ads (send links)

Excellent command of editing software (Premiere Pro, Final Cut, CapCut, etc.)

Strong understanding of ad structure, buyer attention, and conversion psychology

Reliable and responsive communication

Excellent written and spoken English

Nice-to-Have
Experience editing for Pinterest, TikTok, or Meta platforms

Copywriting or storytelling skills (writing hooks, CTA suggestions, etc.)

Ability to work with performance data to refine creative

How to Apply (Read Carefully)
To confirm you’ve read this job post fully, please begin your application with FAST. Applications without this will be ignored.

Please include the following in your application:

A short personal introduction

Portfolio with relevant examples of UGC and direct response ads

Your preferred editing software

monthly rate

Your weekly availability and timezone

Qualified applicants will be shortlisted for a short video call to assess communication, followed by a paid test project.

If you’re someone who values structure, performance, and clear creative direction, we’d love to work with you.

Looking forward to your application,
— Hubert
